IOpenVmHalo2Verifier","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Multi-token support - sellers lock crypto upfront, buyers fill asynchronously Key Features: - Supports any ERC20 token (USDC, USDT, DAI, WETH, etc.) - Sellers lock crypto when creating order (no coordination needed) - Multiple buyers can partially fill one seller order - Auto-expiration of trades (DoS protection) - Automatic settlement after proof verification - Seller can withdraw remaining tokens anytime Configuration: - Token: Any ERC20 (user-specified per order) - Exchange Rate: User-set (P2P market) - Payment Window: Configurable (set at deployment) - Min Trade: Configurable (set at deployment) - Max Trade: Configurable (set at deployment) - Orders never expire - remain active until seller withdraws all funds","errors":{"EnforcedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is paused."}],"ExpectedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is not paused."}],"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. cancelExpiredTrade(bytes32).details: Returns tokens to order pool if trade expired without proof

params._maxTradeValueCny: Maximum trade value in CNY cents (e.g., 7200000 = 72,000 CNY)
params._minTradeValueCny: Minimum trade value in CNY cents (e.g., 70000 = 700 CNY)
params._publicKeyDerHash: Alipay public key DER hash (32 bytes)
params._zkVerifier: Address of OpenVM Halo2 verifier contract

createAndLockOrder(address,uint256,uint2.details: Seller locks tokens upfront, buyers can fill asynchronously

params.exchangeRate: CNY per token unit (adjusted for token decimals)
params.token: ERC20 token address (USDC, USDT, DAI, WETH, etc.)

fillOrder(bytes32,address,uint256).details: Creates a trade and reserves tokens from order's remaining amount

returns.paymentNonce: Unique nonce buyer must include in Alipay payment

returns._0: totalAmount Total tokens locked in order
bool True if order has remaining amount available

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

submitPaymentProof(bytes32,bytes32,bytes.details: Verifies zkPDF proof via OpenVM and immediately releases tokens to buyer

params.userPublicValues: Public output from proof (32 bytes hash)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._maxTradeValueCny: New max trade value in CNY cents (0 = no change)
params._minTradeValueCny: New min trade value in CNY cents (0 = no change)

params._publicKeyDerHash: New Alipay public key DER hash

withdrawAmount(bytes32,uint256).details: Seller can withdraw any amount up to remaining amount

cancelExpiredTrade(bytes32).notice: Cancel expired trade (ANYONE CAN CALL - DoS protection)

constructor.notice: Initialize the escrow contract with trading parameters

createAndLockOrder(address,uint256,uint2.notice: Create order and lock tokens in escrow (SELLER ACTION)

fillOrder(bytes32,address,uint256).notice: Fill an order (BUYER ACTION, called by backend after off-chain match)

getTradeStatus(bytes32).notice: Get trade status as uint8 for easier debugging

isOrderFillable(bytes32).notice: Check if order can be filled

maxTradeValueCny().notice: Maximum trade value in CNY cents - enforced per fill

minTradeValueCny().notice: Minimum trade value in CNY cents - enforced per fill

orders(bytes32).notice: Mapping of orderId to Order struct

pause().notice: Pause the contract in case of emergency

paymentWindow().notice: Payment window for buyer to submit proof (in seconds)

publicKeyDerHash().notice: Alipay public key DER hash (32 bytes)

submitPaymentProof(bytes32,bytes32,bytes.notice: Submit payment proof and auto-settle trade (BUYER ACTION)

trades(bytes32).notice: Mapping of tradeId to Trade struct

updateZkPDFConfig(bytes32,bytes32,bytes3.notice: Update zkPDF configuration (public key hash and commitments)
